<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2779</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Strangest thing that happened to me.-lesson plan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die merkwürdigste Sache, die me.-lesson Plan 
geschah</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La chose la plus étrange qui est arrivée au 
plan de me.-lesson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A coisa a mais estranha que aconteceu à planta 
de me.-lesson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La cosa più sconosciuta che accada al programma 
di me.-lesson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πιό παράξενο πράγμα που συνέβη στο σχέδιο 
εμένα-μαθήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cosa más extraña que sucedió al plan de 
me.-lesson</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for a writing activity where students write about something strange which happened to them. Includes actual examples.Includes an assessment rubric</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Schreiben Aktivität, 
in der Kursteilnehmer über merkwürdiges etwas schreiben, das ihnen 
geschah. Enthält tatsächliches examples.Includes eine 
Einschätzung Rubrik</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité d'écriture 
où les étudiants écrivent au sujet de quelque chose de étrange qui
est arrivée à eux. Inclut examples.Includes réel une rubrique
d'évaluation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade da 
escrita onde os estudantes escrevam sobre algo estranho que lhes 
aconteceu. Inclui examples.Includes real um rubric da 
avaliação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività di 
scrittura dove gli allievi scrivono circa qualche cosa di sconosciuto 
che accada loro. Include examples.Includes reale una rubrica di 
valutazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα γραψίματος
όπου οι σπουδαστές γράφουν για κάτι που περίεργα συνέβη σε τους.
Περιλαμβάνει τα πραγματικά παραδείγματα περιλαμβάνει μια 
ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad de la 
escritura donde los estudiantes escriben sobre algo extraño que les 
sucedió. Incluye examples.Includes real una rúbrica del 
gravamen</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
